MessageServer - Class in ControllerP2
This class is a multithreaded-server that implements MessageListener (use of Callback) that contains message objects to be delivered to the clients.
MessageServer(MessageManager, int) - Constructor for class ControllerP2.MessageServer
This constructor takes in a messageManager where this class is registered to and a port.
